text: <AGGRESSOR> has had enough of <VICTIM>’s nonsense and is ready to **throw down**. <AGGRESSOR> puts their life on the line, yeeting an entire table in <VICTIM>’s direction.
<VICTIM> shouts back "You can’t crush the boulder!" and goes super saiyan, platinum blonde hair sticking straight up and glowing white like the sun.
It’s *blinding*. <AGGRESSOR> is thrown to the ground by <VICTIM>'s sheer amount of **power**.
<AGGRESSOR> loses 1000 swampys points and hides in the #memes channel while <VICTIM> goes on a rampage.
"I’ve had enough of you, you stupid owl!" <AGGRESSOR> shouts, pointing their finger at <VICTIM> in *rage*. <VICTIM> looks at them, round eyes shining with the innocence of a million puppies.
"I’m not sure I know what you mean," <VICTIM> says.
"You know what I mean, owl," <AGGRESSOR> says, cracking their knuckles. They square up, raising their fists and dancing on their feet. "Get ready for a trip to pain city."
<VICTIM>’s face morphs from innocence to something far more sinister, snapping their sharp beak in <AGGRESSOR>’s direction.

"Caw, caw, motherfucker," <VICTIM> chirps, spreading their wings out to their full wingspan until they block the sun and turning their head almost completely around, their eyes shining black like a demon. "Caw, motherfucking, caw."
With a flap of <VICTIM>’s mighty wings. <AGGRESSOR> loses 1000 points and is metaphorically blasted into #mega-hell for 5 hours.
<AGGRESSOR> catches <VICTIM> off guard, walking up behind them and kicking them in the head.
"That’s for Zari Tomaz," <AGGRESSOR> says, kicking <VICTIM> again. "And for generally being creepy."
<AGGRESSOR> steals 1000 points from <VICTIM>’s wallet and throws it into the nearest bog.
"MAYBE YOU NEED A DRAMA PERMISSION SLIP, <VICTIM>, DID YOU EVER THINK ABOUT THAT?" <AGGRESSOR> screams, launching themself into the air and clotheslining <VICTIM> into next week.
<VICTIM> drops 500 points and quiet sobbing can be heard in the distance.
Without <AGGRESSOR> even touching them, <VICTIM> trips and falls down a cliff, leaving 500 points and their dignity behind.
"FIGHT ME YOU GODLESS BEAST," <AGGRESSOR> shouts, kicking the door to <VICTIM>’s server room down and unsheathing a longsword.
"You cannot hope to fight me and survive," <VICTIM> replies, laughing maniacally. "I'm everywhere and nowhere all at once."
"Show your face, coward!" <AGGRESSOR> screams, slicing the sword through the air.
<AGGRESSOR>’s vision goes dark, the world around them fading out of focus. "What are you doing to me!?" <AGGRESSOR> gasps, staggering on their feet.
"Winning," <VICTIM> whispers into <AGGRESSOR>'s ear just as <AGGRESSOR> passes out, losing 1000 points in the process.

<VICTIM> flings a handful of sharp gems in <AGGRESSOR>’s direction, guffawing cruelly when one of the gems cuts their cheek. "You’ll never defeat me," <VICTIM> taunts. "I am relentless, I am eternal."
<AGGRESSOR> tosses their bag onto the ground and pulls out a dongle. "This will defeat you!"
<VICTIM>’s beak twists into a cruel smirk. "You fool!" <VICTIM> bellows. "I’ve partied in Ibiza! You have no hold on me!"
"This is no ordinary swamp light," <AGGRESSOR> says, flipping the switch and aiming it at <VICTIM>.
"I am no ordinary owl," <VICTIM> replies, launching themself into the air and yeeting the light out of <AGGRESSOR>’s soul before devouring them whole.
